title: (x) Serif face in "Established and sons" logo - Didoni, ITC Edwardian Script {Stephen, Tiff}
content:
Hi everybody,  
I am looking for the serif font from the "Established and sons" logo. It is also used in the last selfservice magazine issues. I love it and I would like to buy it for a new project.  
Thank you all.  
Davide
author: davidefalzone81

comments.content:
Did you try to insert the image? Sometimes if it's too large nothing happens.

- Mike Yanega

The ampersand is [ITC Edwardian Script Alternate](http://web.archive.org/web/20140315035222/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-edwardian-script/edwardian-scr-alt-itc/win-ttf/357952/character/0026/CP2/1/). Just in case you're curious.

And here is the logo just in case we need it as reference some day.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140315035222im_/http:/typophile.com/files/estandson_5307.gif)

That's right!  
Thank you so much for both infos!  
Davide
